name: Splash of paint
description:
This is my first finished game, for my first finished Game Jam. The theme was 'size matters'. In the game you control a splash of paint that changes is size depending how much ink it has left. The game ends if you run out of ink, but you need a small size to fit through the level.

Controls:

A/D or Arrow keys for horizontal movement

Up Key, W or Space for jumping

Left mouse button for shooting

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiocCQSDynOKXLqRIrSv6Ng

Twitter: https://twitter.com/silvallis
